paper_keywords: shared access to data structures with linear values
paper_abstract: We extend the linear pi-calculus with composite regular types in such a way that data containing linear values can be shared among several processes, if there is no overlapping access to such values. We describe a type reconstruction algorithm for the extended type system and discuss some practical aspects of its implementation.
paper_title: TYPE RECONSTRUCTION FOR THE LINEAR pi-CALCULUS WITH COMPOSITE REGULAR TYPES
